line_2: Our drooping Heads and Eyes in Tears
The wary counsel wak'd his fears;

line_1: He drops into the dark, and disappears.
line_2: Till with Vexation tir'd, and threescore Years,
Their virtues, ripening with their years,
"But short those joys; for scarce had fifteen years
Sorrow leads her train in tears,

line_1: Jumps down her throat, and disappears.
line_2: When strait the cause of all her fears
